revised_title: Numerical Analysis of Partial Differential Equations: Integral Equation Methods for Exterior Boundary-Value Problems
tldr: The authors discuss the application of integral equation methods to the numerical solution of exterior boundary-value problems for Laplace's equation and the Helmholtz equation. They demonstrate a phenomenon of non-uniqueness in the solution and propose a practical method to overcome this difficulty. The methods have been successfully applied to various problems in acoustic diffraction and fluid dynamics.
